# targetthis

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `targetthis` is to provide a graphical user interface to assist in building targets pipelines.

## Installation

You can install the development version of targetthis from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("PatrickCoyle/targetthis")
```
